column4: I have Acer laptop travelMate 291LCi, the dirver (INTEL) works fine on Ubunto 6.06 but it doesn't work on 7.10
what is the issue--black screen low res etc
it is an old one Intel 852GM
ok then is it a desktop or laptop
have you installed gutsy or just the livecd mode
does it need the restricted drivers?
there are some threads at ubuntuforums.org on this card and 3d effects--seems like compiz is not easy to get going. what is the possible max res on that computer?
